Articles.Content:
As a reminder to everyone who may have hosted material on SPACEPORT, this will be the last day of the site's availability. If you haven't backed up your work and found an alternate host for it, you must do so by end of day today (Squad time).

So what will happen onto the material that's already on Spaceport if the creators haven't been able to back it up themselves? Fear not - no content will be lost. Squad has backed up the entire contents of Spaceport and we are looking for ways to preserve the important work of our mod developers and community.

If you're looking for a new mod host, we recommend making the switch to CURSE, our new official repository. New mods are being uploaded there each day and the staff has been quick to make improvements based on feedback from the community. It's an experience we think you'll be pleased with.
